amendment.description: Amendment allows servicemen and women to transfer academic credits earned while serving in the Armed Forces between institutions of higher education.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report to 111-256 to allow servicemen and women to tranfer academic credits earned while serving in the Armed Forces between institutions of higher education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Minnick amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 428 - 0 (Roll no. 714).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Minnick amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 428 - 0 (Roll no. 714).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Minnick.
